knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r}
#Attach packages

library(ggplot2)
library(readr)
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)

```


```{r}
#Load data

Supp_econ_table <- read_csv("C:/Users/v.r.saccomanno/Desktop/Fed. Fish Disasters/Supp_econ_table_csv_R_FINAL.csv")
View(Supp_econ_table)

```

```{r}
#make tables

Supp_econ_table %>%
  kable() %>%
  kable_styling()

#Bootstrap
kable(Supp_econ_table) %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "condensed"))

#Bootstap + LaTex
option_2<- kable(Supp_econ_table, "latex", booktabs = T) %>%
kable_styling(latex_options = "striped")

```
